short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a scroll mark on a page and scroll down to the marker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used to mark a scrolling point and scroll down to that point.

To use, first pin the extension after install. 
After that, in the website that you want to scroll-mark, click the extension icon, then click a point in the website.
A marker should show up.
You can now refresh the page, and it will auto scroll to that point.

Note:
- If you want to delete a marker, right click at the marker icon --> options --> then delete the marker manually
